response.description: The hashtag 'foodie' is widely used by food enthusiasts, bloggers, and chefs on Instagram. It is used to tag posts that feature culinary adventures, recipes, food photography, and dining experiences. This hashtag connects a global community of food lovers sharing their passion for food and cooking. Using the 'foodie' hashtag can help users discover new cuisines, restaurants, and food trends, as well as connect with other culinary aficionados.
